info.name: Payments API
info.description:
#### Developer Guide

[https://developers.circle.com/docs/getting-started-with-the-circle-payments-api](https://developers.circle.com/docs/getting-started-with-the-circle-payments-api)

#### **Description**

The Circle Payments API allows you to take payments from your end users via traditional methods such as debit & credit cards, bank accounts (wires and ACH), etc., and receive settlement in USDC.

The Circle Payments API has been designed with any business or internet commerce in mind, not just crypto applications, and it's based on Circle's extensive experience processing millions of card payments since 2014.

item.name: Payments

variable.description: (REQUIRED) Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) of a resource.

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-get-id](Pageshttps://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-get-idDescriptionGet)

#### Description

Get information on a given payment.

query.description: Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) for the source. Filters results to fetch only payments made from the provdided source.
Queries items with the specified settlement id. Matches any settlement id if unspecified.
Source account type. Filters the results to fetch all payments made from a specified account type. Matches any source type if unspecified.
Queries items with the specified status. Matches any status if unspecified.
Queries items created since the specified date-time (inclusive).
Queries items created before the specified date-time (inclusive).

A collection ID value used for pagination.

It marks the exclusive end of a page. When provided, the collection resource will return the next n items before
the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageAfter.

A collection ID value used for pagination.

It marks the exclusive begin of a page. When provided, the collection resource will return the next n items after
the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageBefore.

Limits the number of items to be returned.

Some collections have a strict upper bound that will disregard this value. In case the specified value is higher
than the allowed limit, the collection limit will be used.

If avoided, the collection will determine the page size itself.

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-get](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-get)

#### Description

Get a list of payments.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-create)

#### Description

Create a card payment with CVV verificaton.

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**keyId** *string* (REQUIRED for CVV verification)  
Identifier of the public key used in encryption.

**metadata** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **email** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Email of the user.
*   **phoneNumber** *string*  
    *Phone number of the user in E.164 format. We recommend using a library such as [libphonenumber](https://github.com/google/libphonenumber) to parse and validate phone numbers.
*   **sessionId** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Hash of the session identifier; typically of the end user. This helps us make risk decisions and prevent fraud. IMPORTANT: Please hash the session identifier to prevent sending us actual session identifiers.
*   **ipAddress** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Single IPv4 or IPv6 address of the end-user.
    

**amount** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **amount** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Magnitude of the amount, in units of the currency, with a `.`.
*   **currency** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Currency code for the amount.
    

**autoCapture** *boolean*  
Triggers the automatic capture of the full payment amount. If set to false the payment will only be authorized but not captured.

**verification** *string* (REQUIRED - Cards Only)  
Indicates the verification method for this payment.

**verificationSuccessUrl** *string*  
The URL to redirect users to after successful 3DS authentication.

**verificationFailureUrl** *string*  
The URL to redirect users to after failed 3DS authentication.

**source** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **id** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Unique system generated identifier for the entity.
*   **type** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Type of the source.
    

**description** *string*  
Description of the payment with length restriction of 240 characters.

**encryptedData** *string* (REQUIRED for CVV verification)  
PGP encrypted base64 encoded string. Contains CVV e.g. {cvv: 123}.

**channel** *string*  
The channel identifier that can be set for the payment. When not provided, the default channel is used.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-create)

#### Description

#### Body Params

**metadata** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **email** *string* (REQUIRED)

*   **phoneNumber** *string*  
    *Phone number of the user in E.164 format. We recommend using a library such as [libphonenumber](https://github.com/google/libphonenumber) to parse and validate phone numbers.
*   **sessionId** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Hash of the session identifier; typically of the end user. This helps us make risk decisions and prevent fraud. IMPORTANT: Please hash the session identifier to prevent sending us actual session identifiers.
*   **ipAddress** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Single IPv4 or IPv6 address of the end-user.
    

**amount** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **amount** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Magnitude of the amount, in units of the currency, with a `.`.
*   **currency** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Currency code for the amount.
    

**autoCapture** *boolean*  
Triggers the automatic capture of the full payment amount. If set to false the payment will only be authorized but not captured.

**verification** *string* (REQUIRED - Cards Only)  
Indicates the verification method for this payment.

**verificationSuccessUrl** *string* (REQUIRED for 3DS)  
The URL to redirect users to after successful 3DS authentication.

**verificationFailureUrl** *string* (REQUIRED for 3DS)  
The URL to redirect users to after failed 3DS authentication.

**source** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **id** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Unique system generated identifier for the entity.
*   **type** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Type of the source.
    

**description** *string*  
Description of the payment with length restriction of 240 characters.

**encryptedData** *string*  
PGP encrypted base64 encoded string. Contains CVV e.g. {cvv: 123}.

**channel** *string*  
The channel identifier that can be set for the payment. When not provided, the default channel is used.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-create)

#### Description

Create a card payment with no verificaton.

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**keyId** *string*  
Identifier of the public key used in encryption.

**metadata** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **email** *string* (REQUIRED)

*   **phoneNumber** *string*  
    *Phone number of the user in E.164 format. We recommend using a library such as [libphonenumber](https://github.com/google/libphonenumber) to parse and validate phone numbers.
*   **sessionId** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Hash of the session identifier; typically of the end user. This helps us make risk decisions and prevent fraud. IMPORTANT: Please hash the session identifier to prevent sending us actual session identifiers.
*   **ipAddress** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Single IPv4 or IPv6 address of the end-user.
    

**amount** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **amount** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Magnitude of the amount, in units of the currency, with a `.`.
*   **currency** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Currency code for the amount.
    

**autoCapture** *boolean*  
Triggers the automatic capture of the full payment amount. If set to false the payment will only be authorized but not captured.

**verification** *string* (REQUIRED - Cards Only)  
Indicates the verification method for this payment.

**verificationSuccessUrl** *string*  
The URL to redirect users to after successful 3DS authentication.

**verificationFailureUrl** *string*  
The URL to redirect users to after failed 3DS authentication.

**source** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **id** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Unique system generated identifier for the entity.
*   **type** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Type of the source.
    

**description** *string*  
Description of the payment with length restriction of 240 characters.

**encryptedData** *string*  
PGP encrypted base64 encoded string. Contains CVV e.g. {cvv: 123}.

**channel** *string*  
The channel identifier that can be set for the payment. When not provided, the default channel is used.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-create)

#### Description

Create an ACH payment.

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**keyId** *string* (Cards Only)  
Identifier of the public key used in encryption.

**metadata** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **email** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Email of the user.
*   **phoneNumber** *string*  
    *Phone number of the user in E.164 format. We recommend using a library such as [libphonenumber](https://github.com/google/libphonenumber) to parse and validate phone numbers.
*   **sessionId** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Hash of the session identifier; typically of the end user. This helps us make risk decisions and prevent fraud. IMPORTANT: Please hash the session identifier to prevent sending us actual session identifiers.
*   **ipAddress** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Single IPv4 or IPv6 address of the end-user.
    

**amount** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **amount** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Magnitude of the amount, in units of the currency, with a `.`.
*   **currency** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Currency code for the amount.
    

**autoCapture** *boolean* (Cards Only)  
Triggers the automatic capture of the full payment amount. If set to false the payment will only be authorized but not captured.

**verification** *string* (REQUIRED - Cards Only)  
Indicates the verification method for this payment.

**verificationSuccessUrl** *string* (Cards Only)  
The URL to redirect users to after successful 3DS authentication.

**verificationFailureUrl** *string* (Cards Only)  
The URL to redirect users to after failed 3DS authentication.

**source** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **id** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Unique system generated identifier for the entity.
*   **type** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Type of the source.
    

**description** *string*  
Description of the payment with length restriction of 240 characters.

**encryptedData** *string* (Cards Only)  
PGP encrypted base64 encoded string. Contains CVV e.g. {cvv: 123}.

**channel** *string*  
The channel identifier that can be set for the payment. When not provided, the default channel is used.

variable.description: (REQUIRED) Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) of a resource.

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-cancel-id](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-cancel-id)

#### Description

The payment will be voided if possible meaning the payment source will not be charged & the payment will never settle.  
Otherwise, the payment will be refunded meaning the payment source will be charged & the payment will be refunded from deductions of future settlements.  
Not all payments are eligible to be cancelled.

A successful response does *not* mean the payment has been cancelled; it only means the cancellation request is successfully submitted.

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**reason** *string*  
Enumerated reason for a returned payment. Providing this reason in the request is recommended (to improve risk evaluation) but not required.

variable.description: (REQUIRED) Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) of a resource.

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-refund-id](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-refund-id)

#### Description

The payment source will be refunded if possible. Not all payments are eligible to be cancelled.

A successful response does *not* mean the payment has been refunded; it only means the refund request is successfully submitted.

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**amount** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **amount** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Magnitude of the amount, in units of the currency, with a `.`.
*   **currency** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Currency code for the amount.
    

**reason** *string*  
Enumerated reason for a returned payment. Providing this reason in the request is recommended (to improve risk evaluation) but not required.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/createsepapayment](https://developers.circle.com/reference/createsepapayment)

#### Description

In the sandbox environment, initiate a mock SEPA payment that mimics the behavior of funds sent through the bank (SEPA) account linked to master wallet.

#### Body Params

**trackingRef** *string* (REQUIRED)  
SEPA tracking reference that needs to be set in the wire reference to beneficiary field. This field is retrievable through the response during SEPA account creation or via the bank instruction endpoint.

**amount** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **amount** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Magnitude of the amount, in units of the currency, with a `.`.
*   **currency** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Currency code for the amount.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-mock-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-payments-mock-create)

#### Description

In the sandbox environment, initiate a mock wire payment that mimics the behavior of funds sent through the bank (wire) account linked to master wallet.

#### Body Params

**trackingRef** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Wire tracking reference that needs to be set in the wire reference to beneficiary field. This field is retrievable through the response during wire account creation or via the bank instruction endpoint.

**amount** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **amount** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Magnitude of the amount, in units of the currency, with a `.`.
*   **currency** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Currency code for the amount.

item.description: Create, cancel, refund, and get updates on card and ACH payments.

item.name: On-chain payments

query.description: Unique identifier for the source or destination wallet of transfers, if any. May not be used in conjunction with destinationWalletId or sourceWalletId. Useful for fetching all transfers related to a wallet.
Unique identifier for the source wallet of transfers, if any.
Unique identifier for the destination wallet of transfers, if any.

Specify if you would like to see identities in the response. Restricts maximum returned items to 5. By default returnIdentities is false, resulting in the response not returning data.source.identities.
Queries items created since the specified date-time (inclusive).
Queries items created before the specified date-time (inclusive).

A collection ID value used for pagination.

It marks the exclusive end of a page. When provided, the collection resource will return the next n items before
the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageAfter.

A collection ID value used for pagination.

It marks the exclusive begin of a page. When provided, the collection resource will return the next n items after
the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageBefore.

Limits the number of items to be returned.

Some collections have a strict upper bound that will disregard this value. In case the specified value is higher
than the allowed limit, the collection limit will be used.

If avoided, the collection will determine the page size itself.

request.description:
Get list of transfers.

Searches for transfers involving the provided wallets. If no wallet ids are provided, searches all wallets associated with your Circle API account. If the date parameters are omitted, returns the most recent transfers. This endpoint returns up to 50 transfers in descending chronological order or pageSize, if provided.

query.description: Specify if you would like to see identities in the response. Restricts maximum returned items to 5. By default returnIdentities is false, resulting in the response not returning data.source.identities.

variable.description: (REQUIRED) Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) of a resource.

request.description: Retrieve specific transfer details.

variable.description: (REQUIRED) Identifier for the Circle Account master wallet.

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-on-chain-addresses-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-on-chain-addresses-create)

#### Description

Generates a new blockchain address for a wallet for a given currency/chain pair. Circle may reuse addresses on blockchains that support reuse. For example, if you're requesting two addresses for depositing USD and ETH, both on Ethereum, you may see the same Ethereum address returned. Depositing cryptocurrency to a generated address will credit the associated wallet with the value of the deposit.

#### **Body Params**

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**currency** *string* (REQUIRED)  
A currency associated with a balance or address.

**chain** *string* (REQUIRED)  
A blockchain that a given currency is available on.

query.description: Queries items created since the specified date-time (inclusive).
Queries items created before the specified date-time (inclusive).

A collection ID value used for pagination.

It marks the exclusive end of a page. When provided, the collection resource will return the next n items before
the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageAfter.

A collection ID value used for pagination.

It marks the exclusive begin of a page. When provided, the collection resource will return the next n items after
the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageBefore.

Limits the number of items to be returned.

Some collections have a strict upper bound that will disregard this value. In case the specified value is higher
than the allowed limit, the collection limit will be used.

If avoided, the collection will determine the page size itself.

request.description:

variable.description: (REQUIRED) Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) of a resource.

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-cards-update-id](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-cards-update-id)

#### Description

Update a card.

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**keyId** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Identifier of the public key used in encryption.

**encryptedData** *string* (REQUIRED)  
PGP encrypted base64 encoded string. Contains CVV.

**expMonth** *integer* (REQUIRED)  
Two digit number representing the card's expiration month.

**expYear** *integer* (REQUIRED)  
Four digit number representing the card's expiration year.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-cards-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-cards-create)

#### Description

Create a card.

#### **Body Params**

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**keyId** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Identifier of the public key used in encryption.

**encryptedData** *string* (REQUIRED)  
PGP encrypted base64 encoded string. Contains Number and CVV e.g. {number: 123456789, cvv: 123}

**billingDetails** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **name** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Full name of the card or bank account holder.
*   **city** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    City portion of the address.
*   **line1** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Line one of the street address.
*   **line2** *string*  
    Line two of the street address.
*   **district** *string* (US/CA only)  
    State / County / Province / Region portion of the address. If the country is US or Canada, then district is required and should use the two-letter code for the subdivision.
*   **postalCode** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Postal / ZIP code of the address.
*   **country** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Country portion of the address. Formatted as a two-letter country code specified in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
    

**expMonth** *integer* (REQUIRED)  
Two digit number representing the card's expiration month.

**expYear** *integer* (REQUIRED)  
Four digit number representing the card's expiration year.

**metadata** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **email** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Email of the user.
*   **phoneNumber** *string*  
    *Phone number of the user in E.164 format. We recommend using a library such as [libphonenumber](https://github.com/google/libphonenumber) to parse and validate phone numbers.
*   **sessionId** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Hash of the session identifier; typically of the end user. This helps us make risk decisions and prevent fraud. IMPORTANT: Please hash the session identifier to prevent sending us actual session identifiers.
*   **ipAddress** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Single IPv4 or IPv6 address of the end-user.

item.description: Link, update, and get information on debit/credit cards.

item.name: Wires

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-wires-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-wires-create)

#### Description

Create a U.S. bank account (wires).

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**accountNumber** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Account number that identifies the bank account.

**routingNumber** *string* (REQUIRED)  
ABA routing number for the bank account. Note this has to be specific for bank wire transfers.

**billingDetails** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **name** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Full name of the bank account holder.
*   **city** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    City portion of the address.
*   **line1** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Line one of the street address.
*   **line2** *string*  
    Line two of the street address.
*   **district** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    State / County / Province / Region portion of the address. If the country is US or Canada, then district is required and should use the two-letter code for the subdivision.
*   **postalCode** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Postal / ZIP code of the address.
*   **country** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Country portion of the address. Formatted as a two-letter country code specified in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
    

**bankAddress** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **bankName** *string*  
    Name of the bank.
*   **city** *string*  
    City portion of the address.
*   **line1** *string*  
    Line one of the street address.
*   **line2** *string*  
    Line two of the street address.
*   **district** *string*  
    State / County / Province / Region portion of the address. US and Canada use the two-letter code for the subdivision.
*   **country** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Country portion of the address. Formatted as a two-letter country code specified in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-wires-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-wires-create)

#### Description

Create a non-U.S. non-IBAN bank account (wires).

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**accountNumber** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Account number that identifies the bank account.

**routingNumber** *string* (REQUIRED)  
The bank's SWIFT / BIC code.

**billingDetails** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **name** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Full name of the bank account holder.
*   **city** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    City portion of the address.
*   **line1** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Line one of the street address.
*   **line2** *string*  
    Line two of the street address.
*   **district** *string* (US/CA Only)  
    State / County / Province / Region portion of the address. If the country is US or Canada, then district is required and should use the two-letter code for the subdivision.
*   **postalCode** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Postal / ZIP code of the address.
*   **country** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Country portion of the address. Formatted as a two-letter country code specified in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
    

**bankAddress** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **bankName** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Name of the bank.
*   **city** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    City portion of the address.
*   **line1** *string*  
    Line one of the street address.
*   **line2** *string*  
    Line two of the street address.
*   **district** *string*  
    State / County / Province / Region portion of the address. US and Canada use the two-letter code for the subdivision.
*   **country** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Country portion of the address. Formatted as a two-letter country code specified in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-wires-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-wires-create)

#### Description

Create a non-U.S. IBAN-supported bank account (wires).

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**iban** *string* (REQUIRED)  
International Bank Account Number (IBAN) for the bank account.

**billingDetails** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **name** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Full name of the bank account holder.
*   **city** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    City portion of the address.
*   **line1** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Line one of the street address.
*   **line2** *string*  
    Line two of the street address.
*   **district** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    State / County / Province / Region portion of the address. If the country is US or Canada, then district is required and should use the two-letter code for the subdivision.
*   **postalCode** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Postal / ZIP code of the address.
*   **country** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Country portion of the address. Formatted as a two-letter country code specified in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
    

**bankAddress** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **bankName** *string*  
    Name of the bank.
*   **city** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    City portion of the address.
*   **line1** *string*  
    Line one of the street address.
*   **line2** *string*  
    Line two of the street address.
*   **district** *string*  
    State / County / Province / Region portion of the address. US and Canada use the two-letter code for the subdivision.
*   **country** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Country portion of the address. Formatted as a two-letter country code specified in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

item.name: ACH

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-ach-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-ach-create)

#### Description

Create a bank account (ACH).

#### Body Params

**idempotencyKey** *string* (REQUIRED)  
Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) idempotency key. This key is utilized to ensure exactly-once execution of mutating requests.

**plaidProcessorToken** *string* (REQUIRED)  
The token for the ACH account provided by the processor (Plaid).

**billingDetails** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **name** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Full name of the bank account holder.
*   **city** *string*  
    City portion of the address.
*   **line1** *string*  
    Line one of the street address.
*   **line2** *string*  
    Line two of the street address.
*   **district** *string*  
    State / County / Province / Region portion of the address. If the country is US or Canada, then district is required and should use the two-letter code for the subdivision.
*   **postalCode** *string*  
    Postal / ZIP code of the address.
*   **country** *string*  
    Country portion of the address. Formatted as a two-letter country code specified in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
    

**metadata** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **email** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Email of the user.
*   **phoneNumber** *string*  
    *Phone number of the user in E.164 format. We recommend using a library such as [libphonenumber](https://github.com/google/libphonenumber) to parse and validate phone numbers.
*   **sessionId** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Hash of the session identifier; typically of the end user. This helps us make risk decisions and prevent fraud. IMPORTANT: Please hash the session identifier to prevent sending us actual session identifiers.
*   **ipAddress** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Single IPv4 or IPv6 address of the end-user.

variable.description: (REQUIRED) Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) of a resource.

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-ach-get-id](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-ach-get-id)

#### Description

Get information on a given ACH account.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-ach-mock](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-bank-accounts-ach-mock)

#### Description

In the sandbox environment, create a mock ACH account and retrieve a processor token that can be used to link an ACH account.

#### Body Params

**account** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **accountNumber** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    The account number of the ACH account.
*   **routingNumber** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    The routing number of the ACH account.For sandbox testing, valid routing numbers include `011000028`, `011201762`, `011500120`, `021214862`, `121000248`, `121140399`, `211073473`, `221172610`, and `011000138`.
*   **description** *string*  
    A description for the ACH account.
    

**balance** *object* (REQUIRED)

*   **balance** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Magnitude of the amount, in units of the currency, with a `.`.
*   **currency** *string* (REQUIRED)  
    Currency code.

item.description: Link and get information on bank account for ACH payments.

query.description: (REQUIRED) Queries items created since the specified date-time (inclusive).
Queries items created before the specified date-time (inclusive).

A collection ID value used for pagination.

It marks the exclusive end of a page. When provided, the collection resource will return the next n items before
the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageAfter.

A collection ID value used for pagination.

It marks the exclusive begin of a page. When provided, the collection resource will return the next n items after
the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageBefore.

Limits the number of items to be returned.

Some collections have a strict upper bound that will disregard this value. In case the specified value is higher
than the allowed limit, the collection limit will be used.

If avoided, the collection will determine the page size itself.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-chargebacks-get](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-chargebacks-get)

#### Description

Retrieve list of chargebacks. Results will be sorted by create date descending: more recent chargebacks will be at the beginning of the list.

variable.description: (REQUIRED) Universally unique identifier (UUID v4) of a resource.

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-chargebacks-get-id](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-chargebacks-get-id)

#### Description

Retrieve information for a given chargeback.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-chargebacks-mock-create](https://developers.circle.com/reference/payments-chargebacks-mock-create)

#### Description

In the sandbox environment, initiate a mock chargeback of a specified payment. The entire payment will be charged back for its full value. The payment must be in the `paid` state (otherwise the endpoint will return a `404`), and each payment can only be charged back once (otherwise the endpoint will return a `409`). This endpoint is only available in the sandbox environment.

#### Body Params

**paymentId** *string*  
The id of the payment to be charged back. Each payment can only be charged back once.

the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageAfter.

the id, with n being specified by pageSize.

The items will be returned in the natural order of the collection.

The resource will return the first page if neither pageAfter nor pageBefore are specified.

SHOULD NOT be used in conjuction with pageBefore.

than the allowed limit, the collection limit will be used.

If avoided, the collection will determine the page size itself.
